_header: Here is the root of philosophy
_description:
Four couplets prefixed to a Latin text, ff. 58-64v, ‘De lapide Philosophorum’ [Singer (1928)
XSinger, Dorothea Waley. Catalogue of Latin and Vernacular Alchemical Manuscripts. 3 vols. Brussels: Lamertin, 1928-31, 855]

BLHar2407.First Lines: Her ys the rote of philosophiWyth hys stalke leuis & progeni…
BLHar2407.Last Lines: …thenke thou god of thys syghtwyth devote prayeris day & nyght
